mapper.select: select s.*,c.com_name ,a.anno_title, a.com_id, a.rec_vol, a.emp_type, comm.comm_ctx, a.rec_edu, a.pay_info, a.work_cdt, a.anno_regdate, a.anno_c_regdate from scrap s inner join announce a on s.anno_code = a.anno_code inner join company c on c.com_id=a.com_id inner join comm on a.career=comm.sub_cat where s.user_id=#{mbid} and comm.main_cat='070' order by s.scr_date desc
